name: Clean and Deploy Node.js App to EC2

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    name: Cleanup & Deploy to EC2
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up SSH access
        run: |
          echo "📁 Creating SSH folder..."
          mkdir -p ~/.ssh
          
          echo "🔐 Writing PEM key to id_rsa..."
          echo "${{ secrets.EC2_KEY }}" | tr -d '\r' > ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          
          echo "🔒 Setting permissions on PEM key..."
          chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          
          echo "📄 Verifying key..."
          head -n 2 ~/.ssh/id_rsa || echo "❌ Invalid PEM key!"

          echo "📡 Adding EC2 host to known_hosts..."
          ssh-keyscan -H ${{ secrets.EC2_HOST }} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts

      - name: Cleanup and Deploy on EC2
        run: |
          ssh -vvv -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa ${{ secrets.EC2_USERNAME }}@${{ secrets.EC2_HOST }} << 'EOF'
            set -e

            echo "🧹 Cleaning existing environment..."
            sudo systemctl stop nginx || true
            pm2 delete all || true
            sudo apt remove -y nginx nodejs || true
            sudo rm -rf /etc/nginx/sites-available/default || true
            sudo rm -rf ~/myapp || true

            echo "📦 Installing system dependencies..."
            sudo apt update -y
            sudo apt install -y curl git nginx

            echo "⬇️ Installing Node.js..."
            curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | sudo -E bash -
            sudo apt install -y nodejs

            echo "🚀 Installing PM2..."
            sudo npm install -g pm2

            echo "🔥 Configuring NGINX..."
            sudo bash -c 'cat > /etc/nginx/sites-available/default <<EOL
            server {
              listen 80;
              location / {
                proxy_pass http://localhost:3000;
                proxy_http_version 1.1;
                proxy_set_header Upgrade \$http_upgrade;
                proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
                proxy_set_header Host \$host;
                proxy_cache_bypass \$http_upgrade;
              }
            }
            EOL'
            sudo systemctl restart nginx

            echo "📁 Cloning and launching app..."
            git clone https://github.com/${{ github.repository }} ~/myapp
            cd ~/myapp/nodejs
            npm install
            pm2 start index.js --name "node-app"
            pm2 save
            pm2 startup systemd -u $USER --hp $HOME

            echo "✅ Clean install and deployment complete!"
          EOF
